entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -7.4°C

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
